title: Hero MotoCorp total sales fall 12 pc in July
description: Hero MotoCorp on Tuesday reported a 12 per cent decline in total sales at 3,91,310 units in July. The company had sold 4,45,580 units in the year-ago period, Hero MotoCorp said in a statement.
